20101208074319.571|20101208074321.000|CCO|WE'LL BE RIGHT BACK,

20101208074351.000|20101208074354.333|CCO|( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )
20101208074354.333|20101208074732.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101208074354.333|20101208074357.667|CCO|               
20101208074357.667|20101208074401.000|CCO|               
20101208074401.000|20101208074411.000|CCO|               
20101208074411.000|20101208074412.667|CCO|       COPD makes it hard
20101208074412.667|20101208074414.333|CCO|       for me to breathe.
20101208074414.333|20101208074416.000|CCO|        But with ADVAIR,
20101208074416.000|20101208074417.667|CCO|      I'm breathing better.
20101208074417.667|20101208074419.333|CCO| So now, I can join the fun and
20101208074419.333|20101208074421.000|CCO|  games with my grandchildren.
20101208074421.000|20101208074422.667|CCO|           Great news!
20101208074422.667|20101208074424.333|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101208074424.333|20101208074426.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101208074426.000|20101208074427.667|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101208074427.667|20101208074429.333|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101208074429.333|20101208074431.000|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101208074431.000|20101208074432.111|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101208074432.111|20101208074433.222|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101208074433.222|20101208074434.333|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101208074434.333|20101208074435.444|CCO|       because it contains
20101208074435.444|20101208074436.556|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101208074436.556|20101208074437.667|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101208074437.667|20101208074438.778|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101208074438.778|20101208074439.889|CCO|        working together
20101208074439.889|20101208074441.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101208074441.000|20101208074442.429|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101208074442.429|20101208074443.857|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101208074443.857|20101208074445.286|CCO|        and should not be
20101208074445.286|20101208074446.714|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101208074446.714|20101208074448.143|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101208074448.143|20101208074449.571|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101208074449.571|20101208074451.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101208074451.000|20101208074452.111|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
